extendedInfo.description: Features- Send web texts for Meteor, O2, Vodafone, Three, eMobile, Tesco mobile, O2 UK and Telenor Serbia- Monitor incoming SMS and read and reply through the inbox- Contact photos are displayed.- Create contact groups for sending messages to multuiple people- An option to mark messages as read in the in-built application as they are read in Cabbage- Send real SMS for numbers that don't work with web text (e.g. 5xxxx numbers) or if web text is not working- Forward incoming SMS as they arrive to a specified number. The phone must be powered on to use this feature. Notifications of incoming calls can also be sent via text- A popup to allow quick reply to incoming messages- Messages and accounts can be exported from Cabbage Lite.- Long press on a message thread to sent the thread via email- Long press the send button to temporarily override the default account and send with another account- Assign a contact to an account so that all messages sent to that contact to be sent using the chosen account- Add signatures to messages- A widget that shows the number of unread messages. Note that widgets are disabled if an application is installed on the SD cardNotes:The app requires permission to write APN settings to work around connectivity problems with Vodafone's network.Vodafone now requires that a 'captcha' image be completed before sending the first text of a session. The image will pop up and can be completed within the app. This should only have to be done once a dayThree customers must register with the Three network's new webtext system at http://webtexts.three.ie and update their account in the app with their new pin to continue sending messages

reviews.title: Great but.....
reviews.comment: I have taken a few stars off because of an ongoing problem and what seems to be a total lack of support.  The app keeps crashing when you receive texts while writing another.
reviews.author: Will Hourihan

reviews.comment: Its using 3 meteor texts everytime i send txt through cabbage ultimate how can this be right??\tDon\'t go near this paid app its useless eating straight in2 my txt allowance, WHY its RUBBISH!!!!
reviews.author: Maria Donoghue

reviews.title: Vodafone fix
reviews.comment: OLD MESSAGE: Won\'t let me even verify my account. It says \'invalid response. Expected a numerical value\'. Message always fails. Please help. Thanks. FIX: In the connectivity settings change the sending method to direct connection. Seems the server url is no longer valid for script method. 3 star instead of 5. Support lacks somewhat.
reviews.author: Stephen Lambert

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Saves me a fortune on credit every month! Well worth the \342\202\2541 but the free version is spot on too. Worked fine on Meteor but will not work for me on three!! Ok correction it now works, the reason it wasn\'t working was because where you enter your number and password there was a space at the end of my number which caused it to not recognise my number. back to 5* cheers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic App
reviews.comment: This is truly a fantastic app. I upgraded from the lite version and now only use this app to send txts. It has saved me a fortune and works perfect with Three (Ireland). Well worth 99c.
reviews.author: Sheila Winters

reviews.title: Vodafone Ireland broken
reviews.comment: Does not send messages. First,  Sending, then Failed. No capture shown. Even account verification does not work - expecting some numeric value.
reviews.author: Sergey Udaltsov

reviews.title: Vodafone issues
reviews.comment: This is a brilliant app. I\'ve been using cabbage lite for quite a while n its been amazing. Bt since today am encountering some issues with it like it cant recognise Vodafone network anymore thus I upgraded to this one bt still the same problem. Can anybody help plzzz.. I rely a lot on txt so plzz help..!!
reviews.author: Vic Visham

reviews.title: Great until this week!
reviews.comment: This has been a brilliant app but for some reason it is  not working for Vodafone. Ie. Sending fails. I so wish you could fix this. Edit- now picked up a fix via a forum and up and running again. Pity the fix wasn\'t obvious but otherwise I think it\'s a great app.
reviews.author: Lynn Killen

reviews.title: Way better than the original...
reviews.comment: ... which was unreal before it stopped working lately.. bout time I gave something back to the developer anyway.. Meant to foe a while.
reviews.author: Ivan Terry

reviews.title: Not working now
reviews.comment: It has not worked for the last few days. Says expected a numerical value.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Texting has never been easier with Cabbage Ultimate for me. I can now get 300 Free Texts by using my Meteor Data Plan Thank You, Cabbage Ultimate.
reviews.author: Darius Foster

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Fantastic app. Well worth the money. Using with Vodafone perfectly. Does have problems when hyperlink is in a received message. ie When receive response from Androidlost with location map, hyperlink doesn\'t work. 5 Stars when fixed.
reviews.author: Joe Denehan

reviews.title: Best App on my Phone
reviews.comment: I\'ve upgraded from the Lite version because it was such a brilliant app and I\'m even more impressed with this. The extra features are well worth the minimal cost. The Captcha add-on has got round the annoying Vodafone security codes and now its just as easy as using the standard sms app on the phone. It actually has more features such as scheduling messages to be sent at a later time/date. As I\'m now able to send any network & international texts for free its saving me a fortune too! Excellent!!!
reviews.author: Lisa Cullimore

reviews.title: love it
reviews.comment: every messsge i recieve i get twice one tru cabbage n one tru my inbox. can i stop dis anyone no
reviews.author: Becka Buckley

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I have been using cabbage basic for a while but I finally spent out for cabbage ultimate. It is brilliant I get pop ups for my message, I can reply straight away and oh yay it is freeee. Love!!!! Oh and btw to some people who say it uses their normal texts... there is an option to send via web text and specify a default account. It is very very easy to set up! An it also tells you how many texts you have left after each one you send. It will say if the msg fails, it has an inbuilt thread message system so you can use it as your default message system.
reviews.author: Georgia Conroy

reviews.title: Can\'t verify my account
reviews.comment: Why can\'t I verify my account??? I\'ve tried numerous times to verify it This is a paid app and I need it working....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Decided to get the paid version. Very good app.
reviews.author: david beattie

reviews.title: Still not working on Vodafone.
reviews.comment: Will gladly give 5 stars once its back up and running. Bit annoying since this is a paid app. Developers, please get on this.
reviews.author: Shell Lenane

reviews.title: O2 maintenance
reviews.comment: For the past two days, a message come out saying the text failed due to o2 scheduled maintenance but you can text from the web so there is an issue with the app. I emailed and have yet to get a response, poor quality for now.
reviews.author: Mike Taylor

reviews.title: Huawei
reviews.comment: Update; Not working for the past 3/4 days now on o2, what\'s going on?
reviews.author: A Google User
